title: Boards says I am not 7+
body:
How long does this take to refresh? 

Another board similar to this also mentioned that creating a post sometimes does it. Trying it out, If it doesn't I will wait patiently.

Edit: It worked! Aha ZING!

replies.body: It's not working for me either. I can't post on a lot of boards because i'm apparently "not level 6+."

>Another board similar to this also mentioned that creating a post sometimes does it.

Try making a discussion here in the help and support area. It did it for me.. 

Then Log out and log in. I had to re-log

Woohoo!  Looks like posting has updated your boards profile.  Sometimes a profile needs to sync, especially if it's posting for the first time.  Let me know if you run into any other posting issues.  Happy posting!
Thank you! I will enjoy it indubitably.
